title: Charles R. To our trustie and welbeloved, the Lord Major, aldermen, and sheriffs of our City of London.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,
notes: "Given at our court at York the 14 day of June, in the 18 yeer of our reign. 1642".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
